mapper.select: SELECT pc. CODE FROM FD_PROJECT_MAP_CATEGORY pmc INNER JOIN FD_PROJECT_CATEGORY pc ON pmc.CATEGORY_ID = pc.id WHERE pmc.project_id = #{projectId}
SELECT pc.code AS code, pc. NAME AS name, pc.LABEL_CODE as labelCode FROM FD_PROJECT_MAP_CATEGORY pmc INNER JOIN FD_PROJECT_CATEGORY pc ON pmc.CATEGORY_ID = pc.id WHERE pmc.project_id = #{projectId}
SELECT fp.id as projectId, fpc.`NAME` as category FROM fd_project fp LEFT JOIN fd_project_map_category fpmc ON fpmc.PROJECT_ID = fp.id INNER JOIN fd_project_category fpc ON fpc.id = fpmc.CATEGORY_ID
SELECT fpc.`CODE` FROM fd_project_map_category fpmc JOIN fd_project_category fpc on fpc.id=fpmc.CATEGORY_ID WHERE fpmc.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}
